entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
